text:
Hi everyone,
i have a question concerning a dynamic header for e-mails, i have written this code :
```<img src="<https://website.com/{{> company.drivecontactid }}_logo.png" width="100%" height="auto" onerror="this.onerror=null; this.src='<https://fallbackimageurl.com>">```
This one works perfectly fine, but when i use a personalization token for the fallback the image doesn't load.
I guess the token is not correctly resolved or substituted at runtime, does anyone have a tip for me ?
